name: Task Manager (Bilk \_/)
description:
warning with HTML5 music: constant popping

You play as malware inside a computer.

An anti-malware program is trying to remove you.

Your objective is to turn up the heat and cause a complete system shut down.

Your cache is multi-use as both your health and stamina. As well, your attack is multi-use as your only source of movement.

Your goal is to destroy the computer. Avoid proximity to the antivirus to survive, and corrupt them to overload the computer.

You move and attack at the same time. Left-click for a shotgun, Right-click for a grenade. Keep yourself alive, and protect corrupted bodies. While managing your cache, which is your health and ammo.

Be hasty, as the fan will work against you, cooling down the computer.
